thread.section_title: RC Planet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RC Planet | www.rcplanet.com | 8 of 116
thread.title: Cole W
thread.title_full: RC Planet reviewed by Cole W

author: Cole W
title: Cole W
text: Had the truck for 2 weeks and it had never worked. Once it is taken out of the package you cannot return it, but it comes with a warranty. So far I've been going back and forth trying to figure out why the truck isn't working. For $250 the truck should work. I also believe if it doesn't work within the first week then you should be able to return it.
